casebody.data:
Gerald PEDEN et al. v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 491. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. June 2, 1931. James H. Mathers, of Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellants. Roy St. Lewis, U. S. Atty., of Oklahoma City, Okl.

Before LEWIS, PHILLIPS, and Me-DERMOTT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal as to Gerald Peden dismissed June 2,1931, on motion of appellant.
